# Giraff

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="giraff"
  data-widget-id="1"
  data-block-name="novotekaru"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For more information, see [Giraff's documentation](https://www.giraff.io/help).

### Optional parameters

-   `data-widget-id`
-   `data-server-name`

### Required parameters

-   `data-block-name`
